DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect panretinal photocoagulation plus intravitreal ranibizumab treatment patient high risk proliferative diabetic retinopathy term change visual acuity neovascularization area .
DOC.brief_title: Panretinal Photocoagulation ( PRP ) Plus Ranibizumab Proliferative Diabetic Retinopathy
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 18 year old High risk proliferative diabetic retinopathy Visual acuity ≥ 20/800 No previous laser treatment diabetic retinopathy Previous par plana vitrectomy Systemic thromboembolic event Uncontrolled systemic hypertension Conditions avoid adequated documentation Previous eye surgery last 6 month inclusion study
